## Project Overview
Comprehensive task tracking dashboard with:
- User authentication and authorization
- Task creation, listing, and status management (pending, in-progress, completed)
- Drag-and-drop interface for task status updates
- Analytics and reporting dashboard
- Comment system and image attachments
- Email notifications for task assignments
